rows.label: qst202509_msg0001
rows.name:
One moment, please!
That Blade will have to wait outside.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0002
rows.name: Are you referring to me?

rows.label: qst202509_msg0003
rows.name: Yes, you.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0004
rows.name:
But KOS-MOS RE: Re: is a member
of our team...

rows.label: qst202509_msg0005
rows.name:
That Blade is far too dangerous.
She cannot be allowed to have an
audience with His Majesty.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0006
rows.name:
That seems unnecessary to me.
Please, stand down.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0007
rows.name: E-Emperor Nefer?!

rows.label: qst202509_msg0008
rows.name:
B-but if I may, Your Majesty,
this Blade was just responsible for...

rows.label: qst202509_msg0009
rows.name: That is quite all right.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0010
rows.name:
We would have suffered far greater
damage if it were not for her efforts.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0011
rows.name:
Besides which, her Driver is more
than worthy of our trust.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0012
rows.name: There is no cause for concern.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0013
rows.name: Now please, leave her be.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0014
rows.name: As you wish, Your Majesty!

rows.label: qst202509_msg0015
rows.name: I apologize for all that.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0016
rows.name:
I feel the business you bring from King
Serich may have something to do
with the recent artificial Blade attack.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0017
rows.name: Could you explain what you know?

rows.label: qst202509_msg0018
rows.name: I see... Artificial Blades going berserk...

rows.label: qst202509_msg0019
rows.name:
I presume that includes the artificial
Blades that attacked us just now?

rows.label: qst202509_msg0020
rows.name:
Yes. They appeared to have lost the
capacity to take orders and gone
berserk, just like those we saw before.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0021
rows.name:
Right now, the Divine Beasts of Superbia,
Luxuria and Invidia are all gathered
around the World Tree.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0022
rows.name:
There is a real danger that the artificial
Blades Iira released upon the Tree
could attack these nearby nations.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0023
rows.name:
Hmm... I think I understand
the situation now.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0024
rows.name:
We may have been lucky enough to
avoid any major damage so far, but this
is not a threat we can simply ignore.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0025
rows.name:
We will work with Luxuria and Invidia
to find a solution to this problem.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0026
rows.name: Thank you for your understanding.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0027
rows.name: No need to thank me.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0028
rows.name:
Compared to the efforts you have
put in, I have done precious little.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0029
rows.name:
The least I can do is take care of this
situation while you focus on the tasks
you must attend to.

rows.label: qst202509_msg0030
rows.name:
Yes, Your Majesty!
In that case, we will take our leave.
